_description: Copy this to models.json and configure your providers. API keys are loaded from environment variables.
_note: After editing, run 'npm run generate:schema' to update IDE autocomplete

providers._comment: OpenAI Provider - Set OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable to enable
providers.name: OpenAI
providers.description: Leading AI provider with advanced reasoning and tool-calling capabilities

models.description: Latest GPT-4 model with enhanced reasoning and reduced latency
Faster, cost-effective version of GPT-4.1 for most tasks
Multimodal model with vision, audio, and advanced reasoning
Efficient multimodal model, great for everyday tasks
Advanced reasoning model for complex problems and analysis

providers._comment: Google Gemini - Set GOOGLE_GENERATIVE_AI_API_KEY environment variable to enable
providers.name: Google Gemini
providers.description: Google's advanced AI with strong reasoning and multimodal capabilities

models.description: Experimental fast model with improved reasoning and tool use
Pro model with 2M context window, excellent for long documents
Fast model optimized for speed while maintaining quality

providers._comment: Anthropic Claude - Set ANTHROPIC_API_KEY environment variable to enable
providers.name: Anthropic Claude
providers.description: Safety-focused AI with excellent reasoning and ethical guidelines

models.description: Most capable Claude model with advanced reasoning and coding
Fast and efficient model for everyday tasks and quick responses
Most powerful Claude model for complex analysis and creativity

providers._comment: xAI Grok - Set XAI_API_KEY environment variable to enable
providers.name: xAI Grok
providers.description: Elon Musk's AI with real-time knowledge and humor

models.description: Latest Grok model with real-time internet access and wit
Grok with vision capabilities for image understanding

providers._comment: Ollama Local Models - No API key required, but Ollama must be running locally
providers.name: Ollama (Local)
providers.description: Local AI models running on your machine, completely private

models.description: Large Meta model with excellent performance across tasks
Specialized coding model for programming tasks
Microsoft's efficient model with strong reasoning

providers.name: OpenRouter
providers.description: Access to multiple AI models through a unified API

models.description: Free tier access to Claude 3.5 Sonnet (rate limited)
Free tier access to GPT-4o Mini (rate limited)
Qwen's specialized coding model for programming tasks

providers.name: Groq
providers.description: Ultra-fast inference for popular open-source models

models.description: Latest Llama model with excellent performance and speed
Mixture of experts model with 32k context window

providers.name: My Custom Provider
providers.description: Example configuration for custom OpenAI-compatible APIs

models.description: Custom model fine-tuned for specific use cases

providers.name: Azure OpenAI
